-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fsweb.category
(
    id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 ),
    name character varying(45) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fsweb.book
(
    id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 ),
    name character varying(45) NOT NULL,
    category_id bigint,
    autor_id bigint,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fsweb.autor
(
    id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 ),
    first_name character varying(45) NOT NULL,
    last_name character varying(45) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS fsweb.book
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (category_id)
    REFERENCES fsweb.category (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS fsweb.book
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (autor_id)
    REFERENCES fsweb.autor (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
